snippet: Thomas Vanek scored twice for Minnesota. Devils General Manager Lou Lamoriello, who had coached every game since firing Peter DeBoer in late December, stayed in the press box.
abstract: Minnesota Wild beats New Jersey Devils, 6-2, in NHL action.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Vanek scored twice for Minnesota. Devils General Manager Lou Lamoriello, who had coached every game since firing Peter DeBoer in late December, stayed in the press box.

headline.main: Devils Are Routed by the Wild
headline.print_headline: Devils Routed by Wild on the Road
